accessRejected: allow the app to access your device location
invalidProp: invalid value for the {property} property (value received: \"{value}\")
tooClose: move at least {required, number, .00} {required, plural, one {meter} other {meters}} away (you are {current, number, .00} {current, plural, one {meter} few {meters} other {meters}} away)
tooFar: maximum distance is {required, number, .00} {required, plural, one {meter} other {meters}} (you are {current, number, .00} {current, plural, one {meter} few {meters} other {meters}} away)
